folder: Broad Street & Targee Street, Staten Island, NY
text:
291,293, and 297 Broad Street, at, adjoining, and west of the N.W. corner of Targee Street.

February 25, 1931.

P. L. Sperr.

folder: Broad Street & Targee Street, Staten Island, NY
text:
Broad Street (right), north side, east from Targee to Gordon Streets. Also shown (left) is the east side of Targee Street, north from Broad Street, with the Immaculate Conception Roman Catholic Church appearing in the background.

February 25, 1931.

P. L. Sperr.

folder: Targee Street & Broad Street, Staten Island, NY
text:
179 Targee Street, adjoining the S. E. corner of Broad Street, showing an old frame house.

February 25, 1931

P. L. Sperr

folder: Targee Street & Broad Street, Staten Island, NY
text:
(1)
Targee Street, east side, between Broad Street and Purdy Street, showing the Immaculate Conception Roman Catholic Church.
February 25, 1931

P. L. Sperr

(2)
The same, another view, On the extreme right is visible part of the "Sisters' House."
February 25, 1931

P. L. Sperr

(3)
The "Sisters' House" of the Church of the Immaculate Conception, adjoining the church on the south.
February 25, 1931

P. L. Sperr

Stapleton, Staten Island: A general view south across Stapleton toward Concord, seen from Pearl Street, on Grymes Hill. In the foreground is the Roman Catholic Church of the Immaculate Conception on Targee Street, near Broad Street.

View 2 is in the same general direction, toward Concord, showing the sloping Grymes Hill.

June 23, 1937
Views 1, 2

P: L. Sperr
title: Richmond:] Staten Island - Stapleton - [Immaculate Conception Roman Catholic Church].

text:
Stapleton, Staten Island: A general view south across Stapleton toward Concord, seen from Pearl Street, on Grymes Hill. In the foreground is the Roman Catholic Church of the Immaculate Conception on Targee Street, near Broad Street.

View 2 is in the same general direction, toward Concord, showing the sloping Grymes Hill.
